hiveArticle.title: Beautiful Looking flowers
hiveArticle.body:
While going for my evening walk, I saw some beautiful looking white flowers. They were not in single s but found in bunches. It was all over the bush, where they had a lot of similar flowers. I tried to take few macro shots of the flowers using my smartphone.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/vjukynnzvr.jpg)

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/h0d4527g8d.jpg)

### Camera: Nokia 6
